author: The Paz "pazmanian"

review: In the begining it had awesome streaming netflix, youtube and other media without any error what-so-ever, however just after 3 months this thing wont even cast correctly for more than 5-10 minutes without "Brain Freezing", I send the cast via 2 Android phones and 3 different computers but it always brain freezes.Imagine trying to watch a netflix movie and having to restart every five minutes.This is not a unique error, recently a lot of people have been getting this error around the same time, its been about a month now and there is just no solution that works for me. There is a post on google support to follow some steps but they dont work at all.Very dissapointed specially after I suggested this product to a lot of people.Never again will i buy another Chromecast. The warranty was for about 3 months so i couldnt return it. Googles warranty specifies that they will refund only for hardware damages not software, and there is no warranty for this kind of errors.
